title: ダイヤモンドSにむけて

text_block_list.text: The day of the 'Diamond S'. At the racecourse entrance, fans call out to her—
Previously, a round-glasses-wearing reporter she met on campus praised her, saying, 'Tannhauser's words saved me,' and commended her positive attitude in aiming for victory.
Encouraged by various people, she takes on the 'Diamond S'!
